trans-unit.source: An element that allows you to host a Windows Forms control on a WPF page.
trans-unit.target: Elemento que permite hospedar un control de Windows Forms en una página de WPF.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element to place a Windows Forms control within your WPF element or page.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> elemento que se va a colocar un control de formularios Windows Forms dentro de su elemento WPF o página.

trans-unit.source: To host a WPF element in a Windows Forms control or form, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> control.
trans-unit.target: Para hospedar un elemento WPF en un formulario o control de formularios Windows Forms, use la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> control.

trans-unit.source: WindowsFormsIntegration.dll is installed with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] assemblies.
trans-unit.target: WindowsFormsIntegration.dll se instala con el [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] ensamblados.

trans-unit.source: The default location for the assembly is %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll.
trans-unit.target: La ubicación predeterminada para el ensamblado es %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll.

trans-unit.source: To host a Windows Forms control in a WPF element, you must assign the Windows Forms control to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para hospedar un control de formularios Windows Forms en un elemento WPF, debe asignar el control de formularios Windows Forms para la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.PropertyMap%2A> property to assign custom mappings between a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element and its hosted Windows Forms control.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.PropertyMap%2A> propiedad para asignar las asignaciones personalizadas entre un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> elemento y su control de formularios Windows Forms hospedado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: Para más información, vea [Asignación de propiedades en formularios Windows Forms y WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).

trans-unit.source: XAML Object Element Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de elementos de objeto XAML

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element to host a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> elemento para hospedar un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a Windows Forms Control in WPF by Using XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-windows-forms-control-in-wpf-by-using-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [Tutorial: hospedar un Control de formularios Windows Forms en WPF XAML usando](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-windows-forms-control-in-wpf-by-using-xaml.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" />.

trans-unit.source: for full trust for all callers higher in the call stack.
trans-unit.target: de plena confianza para todos los llamadores situados en la pila de llamadas.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: Un código de confianza parcial no puede utilizar este miembro.

trans-unit.source: The final area within the parent that this element should use to arrange itself and its children.
trans-unit.target: Área final dentro del elemento primario que este elemento debe usar para organizarse a sí mismo y a los elementos secundarios.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, positions child elements and determines a size for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />-derived class.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se implementa en una clase derivada, coloca los elementos secundarios y determina un tamaño para una clase derivada de <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />.

trans-unit.source: The actual size used.
trans-unit.target: Tamaño real usado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosted control's background as an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el fondo del control hospedado como una propiedad de ambiente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> set to the background color.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> establecido en el color de fondo.

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.BackgroundProperty> field.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad de dependencia se identifica mediante el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.BackgroundProperty> campo.

trans-unit.source: By default, this property is mapped to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: De forma predeterminada, esta propiedad se asigna para actualizar la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedades del control hospedado.

trans-unit.source: For more information on mapping the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Background%2A> property, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre la asignación de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Background%2A> propiedad, vea [Windows Forms y WPF asignación de propiedad](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de atributos XAML

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valores XAML

trans-unit.source: *Brush*
trans-unit.target: *Pincel*

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> for XAML Attribute syntax.
trans-unit.target: Consulte <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> para la sintaxis de atributo XAML.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Información sobre propiedades de dependencia

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propiedades de metadatos establecidos en `true`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.SubPropertiesDoNotAffectRender%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.SubPropertiesDoNotAffectRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Background" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la propiedad de dependencia <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Background" />.

trans-unit.source: The parent window's handle (HWND).
trans-unit.target: Identificador de la ventana primaria (HWND).

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base class implementation of <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.BuildWindowCore(System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleRef)" /> to build the hosted Windows Forms control.
trans-unit.target: Invalida la implementación de la clase base de <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.BuildWindowCore(System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleRef)" /> para compilar el control hospedado de Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: The window handle for this object.
trans-unit.target: Identificador de ventana de este objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the child control hosted by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el control secundario hospedado por el elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" />.

trans-unit.source: The hosted Windows Forms control.
trans-unit.target: El control de formularios Windows Forms hospedado.

trans-unit.source: Only one child control can be hosted, but <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> can have any number of children.
trans-unit.target: Se puede hospedar el control de un solo elemento secundario, pero <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> puede tener cualquier número de elementos secundarios.

trans-unit.source: The child control cannot be a top-level form.
trans-unit.target: El control secundario no puede ser un formulario de nivel superior.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> es un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, del formulario <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A> propiedad está establecida en `false`.

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de texto XAML

trans-unit.source: `<` *object* `>`
trans-unit.target: `<` *Objeto* `>`

trans-unit.source: `<` *hostedControl* `.../>`
trans-unit.target: `<` *hostedControl* `.../>`

trans-unit.source: `</` *object* `>`
trans-unit.target: `</` *Objeto* `>`

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valores XAML

trans-unit.source: *object*
trans-unit.target: *object*

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element (or a possible subclass).
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> elemento (o una subclase posible).

trans-unit.source: *hostedControl*
trans-unit.target: *hostedControl*

trans-unit.source: An element that specifies the hosted Windows Forms control.
trans-unit.target: Un elemento que especifica el control de formularios Windows Forms hospedado.

trans-unit.source: Specifying the custom control in markup usually requires an xmlns mapping, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: Especificar el control personalizado en el marcado suele requerir una asignación xmlns, vea [espacios de nombres XAML y asignación de Namespace para XAML de WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> property to add the hosted control to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> propiedad que se va a agregar el control hospedado en el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> elemento.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting an ActiveX Control in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-an-activex-control-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [Tutorial: hospedar un ActiveX Control en WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-an-activex-control-in-wpf.md).

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to assign a top-level form as the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Se intentó asignar un formulario de nivel superior como control hospedado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child" /> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando se establece el valor de la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child" />.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de atributos XAML

trans-unit.source: A window handle.
trans-unit.target: Identificador de ventana.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: Este parámetro no se utiliza.

trans-unit.source: Overrides <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.DestroyWindowCore(System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleRef)" /> to delete the window containing this object.
trans-unit.target: Invalida <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.DestroyWindowCore(System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleRef)" /> para eliminar la ventana que contiene este objeto.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> para liberar tanto recursos administrados como no administrados; es <see langword="false" /> para liberar únicamente recursos no administrados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" />, and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera los recursos no administrados utilizados por el objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> y, de forma opcional, libera los recursos administrados.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Dispose%2A> method disposes the base <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> control.
trans-unit.target: Llamar a la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Dispose%2A> método desecha la base de <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost> y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> control.

trans-unit.source: Enables a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> to function correctly when it is opened modelessly from WPF.
trans-unit.target: Permite que un objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> funcione correctamente cuando se abre de forma no modal en WPF.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.EnableWindowsFormsInterop%2A> method to forward all keyboard messages when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=nameWithType> is opened modelessly.
trans-unit.target: Llame a la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.EnableWindowsFormsInterop%2A> método para reenviar todos los mensajes de teclado cuando un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=nameWithType> se abre de forma no modal.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.EnableWindowsFormsInterop%2A> method installs a message filter that is required for modeless forms to function correctly when opened by WPF.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.EnableWindowsFormsInterop%2A> método instala un filtro de mensajes que se necesita para funcionar correctamente cuando se abre WPF los formularios no modales.

trans-unit.source: You need to call this method only once for a particular <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> instance.
trans-unit.target: Debe llamar a este método solo una vez para un determinado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> instancia.

trans-unit.source: for full trust for all callers higher in the call stack.
trans-unit.target: de plena confianza para todos los llamadores situados en la pila de llamadas.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: Un código de confianza parcial no puede utilizar este miembro.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosted control's font family.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la familia de fuentes del control hospedado.

trans-unit.source: The font family used in the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: La familia de fuentes que se usa en el control hospedado.

trans-unit.source: This property setting affects only those controls whose template uses the property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Valor de esta propiedad afecta a solo los controles cuya plantilla utiliza la propiedad como un parámetro.

trans-unit.source: It has no effect on other controls.
trans-unit.target: No tiene ningún efecto en otros controles.

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontFamilyProperty> field.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad de dependencia se identifica mediante el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontFamilyProperty> campo.

trans-unit.source: By default, this property is mapped to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: De forma predeterminada, esta propiedad se asigna para actualizar la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad del control hospedado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: Para más información, vea [Asignación de propiedades en formularios Windows Forms y WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).

trans-unit.target: Uso de atributos XAML

trans-unit.target: Valores XAML

trans-unit.source: *fontFamily*
trans-unit.target: *FontFamily*

trans-unit.target: Consulte <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> para la sintaxis de atributo XAML.

trans-unit.target: Identifica la propiedad de dependencia <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontFamily" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosted control's font size.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el tamaño de fuente del control hospedado.

trans-unit.source: The font size used in the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Tamaño de fuente que se usa en el control hospedado.

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontSizeProperty> field.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad de dependencia se identifica mediante el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontSizeProperty> campo.

trans-unit.source: By default, this property is mapped to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: De forma predeterminada, esta propiedad se asigna para actualizar la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad del control hospedado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: Para más información, vea [Asignación de propiedades en formularios Windows Forms y WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de atributos XAML

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valores XAML

trans-unit.source: *double*
trans-unit.target: *double*

trans-unit.source: String representation of a <xref:System.Double> value equal to or greater than 0.0, but smaller than <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>.
trans-unit.target: Representación de cadena de un <xref:System.Double> valor igual o mayor que 0,0 pero menor que <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>.

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: Esto se interpreta como un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] medida.

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: Las cadenas no necesitan incluir explícitamente separadores decimales.

trans-unit.source: For instance a value of 1 is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, un valor de 1 es aceptable.

trans-unit.target: Información sobre propiedades de dependencia

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propiedades de metadatos establecidos en `true`

trans-unit.target: Identifica la propiedad de dependencia <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontSize" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosted control's font style.

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontStyleProperty> field.

trans-unit.source: The font weight used in the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Peso de fuente que se usa en el control hospedado.

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontWeightProperty> field.

trans-unit.target: Para más información, vea [Asignación de propiedades en formularios Windows Forms y WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.target: Identifica la propiedad de dependencia <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontWeight" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosted control's foreground color.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el color de primer plano del control hospedado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> used to set the foreground color for the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> utilizado para establecer el color de primer plano del control hospedado.

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.ForegroundProperty> field.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad de dependencia se identifica mediante el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.ForegroundProperty> campo.

trans-unit.source: By default, this property is mapped to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: De forma predeterminada, esta propiedad se asigna para actualizar la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad del control hospedado.

trans-unit.source: For more information on mapping the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Foreground%2A> property, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre la asignación de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Foreground%2A> propiedad, vea [Windows Forms y WPF asignación de propiedad](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Foreground" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la propiedad de dependencia <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Foreground" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a layout error, such as a skew or rotation that <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> does not support, is encountered.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando se detecta un error de diseño, como un sesgo o una rotación que <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> no admite.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de atributos XAML

trans-unit.source: The available size for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Tamaño disponible para el objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" />.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base class implementation of <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.MeasureOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> to measure the size of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> object and return proper sizes to the layout engine.
trans-unit.target: Invalida la implementación de la clase base de <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.MeasureOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> para medir el tamaño de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> y devolver los tamaños correctos al motor de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The desired size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Tamaño deseado del objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" />.

trans-unit.source: Size constraints in WPF layout are hard constraints.
trans-unit.target: Las restricciones de tamaño en el diseño de WPF son las restricciones de disco duras.

trans-unit.source: If the constraints are exceeded, the host must clip the content within the hosted region.
trans-unit.target: Si se superan las restricciones, el host debe recortar el contenido dentro de la región hospedada.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of this method enforces this behavior.
trans-unit.target: La implementación de este método exige este comportamiento.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowsFormsHostAutomationPeer" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Crea <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowsFormsHostAutomationPeer" /> para el elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowsFormsHostAutomationPeer" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowsFormsHostAutomationPeer" /> para el elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" />.

trans-unit.source: Arguments that identify the property that changed as well as providing that property's old and new values.
trans-unit.target: Argumentos que identifican la propiedad que cambió y proporcionan los valores antiguos y nuevos de esa propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Forces the translation of a mapped property.
trans-unit.target: Obliga a que se traduzca una propiedad asignada.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.OnPropertyChanged%2A> method may be necessary when a property of an ancestor element has changed, but the local value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element has not changed.
trans-unit.target: Llamar a la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.OnPropertyChanged%2A> método puede ser necesario cuando ha cambiado una propiedad de un elemento antecesor, pero el valor local de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> no ha cambiado el elemento.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: Para más información, vea [Asignación de propiedades en formularios Windows Forms y WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).

trans-unit.source: Specifies the size of the desired padding within the hosted Windows Forms control.
trans-unit.target: Especifica el tamaño del relleno deseado en el control hospedado de Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Thickness" /> structure representing the padding pf the hosted Windows Forms control.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Thickness" /> controlar la estructura que representa el relleno Windows Forms hospedado.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de atributos XAML

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valores XAML

trans-unit.source: *Thickness*
trans-unit.target: *Grosor*

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Thickness> for XAML Attribute syntax.
trans-unit.target: Consulte <xref:System.Windows.Thickness> para la sintaxis de atributo XAML.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Información sobre propiedades de dependencia

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propiedades de metadatos establecidos en `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Padding" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la propiedad de dependencia <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Padding" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the property map that determines how setting properties on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> element affects the hosted Windows Forms control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el mapa de propiedades que determina cómo la configuración de las propiedades en el elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> afecta al control hospedado de Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap" /> that maps <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> properties to properties on the hosted Windows Forms control.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap" /> que asigna <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> propiedades a las propiedades en el control de formularios Windows Forms hospedado.

trans-unit.source: The Windows Forms and WPF technologies have two similar but different property models.
trans-unit.target: Las tecnologías de Windows Forms y WPF tienen dos modelos de propiedades similares pero diferentes.

trans-unit.source: *Property mapping* supports interoperation between the two architectures.
trans-unit.target: *Asignación de propiedad* admite la interoperación entre las dos arquitecturas.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: Para más información, vea [Asignación de propiedades en formularios Windows Forms y WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to add a mapping for the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A> property to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> control.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo agregar una asignación para la <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A> propiedad a un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> control.

trans-unit.source: The new scale factor.
trans-unit.target: Nuevo factor de escala.

trans-unit.source: Scales the hosted Windows Forms control, and tracks the scale factor.
trans-unit.target: Escala el control hospedado de Windows Forms y realiza un seguimiento del factor de escala.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> which represents the scale factor applied to the hosted Windows Forms control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> que representa el factor de escala aplicado al control hospedado de Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: Windows Forms controls do not support scaling in the same way as WPF elements.
trans-unit.target: Controles de formularios Windows Forms no admiten el ajuste de escala en la misma manera que los elementos de WPF.

trans-unit.source: For example, scaling a Windows Forms control from a factor of 1 to a factor of 0.5 and back to a factor of 1 does not, in general, recover the original size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, ajuste de escala en un control de formularios Windows Forms de un factor de 1 a un factor de 0,5 y hacia un factor de 1, por lo general, se recupera el tamaño original del control.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Layout Considerations for the WindowsFormsHost Element](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout-considerations-for-the-windowsformshost-element.md).
trans-unit.target: Para más información, vea [Consideraciones sobre el diseño del elemento WindowsFormsHost](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout-considerations-for-the-windowsformshost-element.md).

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.ScaleChild%2A> method to provide custom scaling behavior for the hosted Windows Forms control.
trans-unit.target: Invalidar el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.ScaleChild%2A> método para proporcionar un comportamiento de ajuste de escala personalizado para el control de formularios Windows Forms hospedado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosted control's tab index.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el índice de tabulación del control hospedado.

trans-unit.source: The tab index for tab navigation and focus.
trans-unit.target: Índice de tabulación para la navegación con tabulador y el foco.

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndexProperty> field.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad de dependencia se identifica mediante el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndexProperty> campo.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to change the order of tab navigation among the controls on a form.
trans-unit.target: Utilice esta propiedad para cambiar el orden de navegación entre los controles en un formulario.

trans-unit.source: A control with a lower tab index will get focus before a control with a higher index.
trans-unit.target: Un control con un índice de tabulación más bajo obtendrá el foco antes que un control con un índice más alto.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de atributos XAML

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Información sobre propiedades de dependencia

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propiedades de metadatos establecidos en `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: None

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndex" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la propiedad de dependencia <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndex" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest" /> that specifies the focus behavior.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest" /> que especifica el comportamiento de foco.

trans-unit.source: Forwards focus from WPF to the hosted Windows Forms control.
trans-unit.target: Reenvía el foco desde WPF hasta el control hospedado de Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a control was activated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si se activó un control; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element receives a TAB command from the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A> method, the first eligible control in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> receives focus.
trans-unit.target: Cuando un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> elemento recibe un comando de la PESTAÑA de la <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A> método, el derecho a primer control en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> recibe el foco.

trans-unit.source: The first control is specified by the `request` parameter.
trans-unit.target: El primer control especificado por el `request` parámetro.

trans-unit.source: When `request` is <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Next>, the behavior is similar to pressing the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: Cuando `request` es <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Next>, el comportamiento es similar a presionar la tecla TAB.

trans-unit.source: When `request` is <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Previous>, the behavior is similar to pressing SHIFT+TAB.
trans-unit.target: Cuando `request` es <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Previous>, el comportamiento es similar a presionar la tecla MAYÚS + TAB.

trans-unit.source: Window handle of the hosted window.
trans-unit.target: Identificador de la ventana hospedada.

trans-unit.source: Message to act upon.
trans-unit.target: Mensaje en el que se va a actuar.

trans-unit.source: Information that may be relevant to handling the message.
trans-unit.target: Información que puede ser relevante para controlar el mensaje.

trans-unit.source: This is typically used to store small pieces of information, such as flags.
trans-unit.target: Se suele utilizar para almacenar pequeños fragmentos de información, como los marcadores.

trans-unit.source: Information that may be relevant to handling the message.
trans-unit.target: Información que puede ser relevante para controlar el mensaje.

trans-unit.source: This is typically used to reference an object.
trans-unit.target: Se suele utilizar para hacer referencia a un objeto.

trans-unit.source: Whether events resulting should be marked handled.
trans-unit.target: Indica si los eventos resultantes deben marcarse como controlados.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, accesses the window process of the hosted child window.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se implementa en una clase derivada, obtiene acceso al proceso de la ventana secundaria hospedada.

trans-unit.source: The window handle of the child window.
trans-unit.target: Identificador de ventana de la ventana secundaria.
